thread.section_title: One.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of One.com | www.one.com
thread.title: Marcel Geleijnse

author: Marcel Geleijnse
title: Marcel Geleijnse
text:
This is my personal experience hopefully you have a better one then I initially had. Read to the bottom for the full story.
The communication is quite one way.
Cancelling the account is very difficult: you contact them, they respond vaguely and next year you still get a bill.
I have so far tried 2 time but I still get billed.
I am now at my 3rd attempt to cancel my subscription after the 2nd bill I should not get.
So I initially gave it a 1 star.
I was fed up so decided to started to use their chat.
And what a difference that made. I still can't believe how they turn my initial opinion fully around.
Their chat is very effective and within 4 minutes it all got sorted out.
What a recovery!
Well I have changed from 1 to 4 stars.
My advice now is when you have issues with them use their chat, it works.
